articles.title: Copper prices — traditionally a barometer for the global economy — are expected to soar next year - CNBC
articles.description: Copper — traditionally seen as a leading indicator of economic health because of its use in many sectors — has unsurprisingly had a rough year. Yet analysts expect a resurgence in 2023.

articles.title: Fosun taps big buyout funds for Gland Pharma - Economic Times
articles.description: Chinese billionaire Guo Guangchangs Shanghai Fosun Pharmaceutical Group is the controlling shareholder of listed generic injectables maker Gland, with 57.86% stake. The buyout will trigger an open offer for an additional 26% of the company.
